transcript:
Hello?
Executive: Ji, sir, Dheeraj bol raha tha India Mart se.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Sir ji, abhi link share kar sakta hu? Abhi connect kar le?
Customer: Nahi, abhi nahi sir, abhi dusri jagah mein ek baar busy hu. Free hoke mein aapko call kar sakta hu.
Executive: Kitna time lagega sir ji, lagbhag one hour mein bhi?
Customer: Aadha ghanta lag sakta hai. Dusri jagah mein meeting hai.
Executive: Free hoke mujhe ek baar bataiyega, hai na? Call kijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai ji, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive asked to share a link and connect.



Resolution:

- Customer said he is busy and will call back after getting free.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will call back after half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

call, link, busy, meeting
